mapper.insert: insert into t_link(link_name, url, description, avatar, email, create_date) value (#{linkName},#{url}, #{description}, #{headerImg}, #{email}, #{createDate})

insert into t_comment( email, ip, location, os, browser, parent_id, qq_num, nick_name, avatar, page_id, url, display, content, html_content, reply_id, reply, admin_reply, create_date )values( #{email}, #{ip}, #{location}, #{os}, #{browser}, #{parentId}, #{qqNum}, #{nickName}, #{avatar}, #{pageId}, #{url}, #{display}, #{content}, #{htmlContent}, #{replyId}, #{reply}, #{adminReply}, #{createDate} )
mapper.select: select id, link_name, url, description, header_img from t_link where display = 1 and status = 1
select id, title from t_category order by create_date, support desc

select b.id, b.title, b.summary, b.header_img, b.like, b.click, b.create_date, count(c.id) as comment_count from t_blog b left join t_comment c on b.id = c.page_id where b.support = 1 and b.status = 1 group by b.id order by b.create_date, b.weight desc limit 5

select b.id, b.title, b.summary, b.summary, b.like, b.click, b.create_date, count(c.id) as comment_count from t_blog b left join t_comment c on b.id = c.page_id group by b.id order by click desc limit 5
select t.id, t.title, t.color, count(tm.id) as count from t_tag t left join t_blog_tag_mid tm on t.id = tm.tag_id group by t.id having count(tm.id) > 0
select id, title, description, url, display, target, create_date, update_date from t_carousel
select id, title, type, html_content from t_notice
select id, parent_id, nick_name, avatar, page_id, good, admin_reply, bad, reply_id, html_content as content, create_date, update_date from t_comment where page_id = #{id} order by create_date desc
select title from t_tag t left join t_blog_tag_mid tm on t.id = tm.tag_id where tm.id = #{id}
select id, category_id, title, summary, cover_url, html_content, comment, support, like, click, create_date, update_date from t_blog where id = #{id}
select t.id, color, title, create_date, update_date from t_tag t left join t_blog_tag_mid tm on t.id = tm.tag_id where tm.blog_id=#{id}
select id, dict_key, dict_value from t_dict where dict_key = 'about'
select id, nick_name, email, ip, location, os, browser, parent_id, qq_num, avatar, page_id, url, display, good, bad, content, create_date, reply from t_comment where id = #{id}
select id, link_name, url, description, header_img from t_link order by weight desc
select title from t_blog where id=#{id}
